groupListing.confirmLeaveText: Ka tabbata kanaso kabar wannan rukunin?
groupListing.wouldYouJoin: Kana so ka shiga wannan rukuni?

toolTip.tip1: Ko wane memba din shafin zai iya shiga rukuni.
toolTip.tip2: Za'a saka wannan rukuni acikin wajen ajiyan rukunoni da kuma cikin sakamakon nema.
toolTip.tip3: Memban shafin zai iya ganin abubuwan cikin rukuni da ayyukan.

privacyPublicContent.point1: Ko wane memba din shafin zai iya shiga rukuni.
privacyPublicContent.point2: Za'a saka wannan rukuni acikin wajen ajiyan rukunoni da kuma cikin sakamakon nema.
privacyPublicContent.point3: Memban shafin zai iya ganin abubuwan cikin rukuni da ayyukan.

privacyPrivateContent.point1: Masu amfani da suka nemi yin rajista kuma aka amince musu ne kawai zasu iya shiga wannan rukuni.
privacyPrivateContent.point2: Za'a saka wannan rukuni acikin wajen ajiyan rukunoni da kuma cikin sakamakon nema.
privacyPrivateContent.point3: Memban shafin ne kadai zai iya ganin abubuwan cikin rukuni da ayyukan.

privacyHiddenContent.point1: Membobi da aka gayyata ne kadai zasu iya shiga wannan rukuni.
privacyHiddenContent.point2: Ba za'a saka wannan rukuni acikin wajen ajiyan rukunoni da kuma cikin sakamakon nema.
privacyHiddenContent.point3: Memban shafin ne kadai zai iya ganin abubuwan cikin rukuni da ayyukan.

createGroup.whoCanInvite: Waye zai gayyaci membobi zuwa rukuni?
